title: 如何在僵尸头上生成一个滞留型药水？
txt_content: 如何在玩家附近的僵尸头上生成一个滞留型剧毒药水？求大神来解答。

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
388498173 发表于 2016-12-3 11:14
1.11版本！
/execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=5] ~ ~ ~ /summon potion ~ ~ ~ {Potion:{id:"minecraft:lingering_potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"poison"}}}

/execute @e[type=zombie] ~ ~ ~ /execute @a[r=5] ~ ~ ~ /summon potion ~ ~ ~ {Potion:{id:"minecraft:lingering_potion",Count:1b,tag:{Potion:"poison"}}}复制代码
1.11可以= =

replies.author: lrf8643
replies.txt_content: 是什么个意思。在周围的僵尸头上刷一个已扔出的药水，还是直接给僵尸一个效果。

replies.author: lrf8643
replies.txt_content:
直接给效果可以这样。
execute @a ~ ~ ~ effect @e[r=3,type=zombie] 20 2 1复制代码意思是这样的。任何玩家的半径3m内，只要是僵尸。就会中2秒的凋零Ⅰ

replies.author: 阴阳师元素祭祀
replies.txt_content:
execute @a ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Zombie,r=5] ~ ~ ~ /summon ThrownPotion ~ ~ ~ {Potion:{id:"minecraft:lingering_potion",tag:{Potion:"poison"}}}

execute @a ~ ~ ~ execute @e[type=Zombie,r=5] ~ ~ ~ /summon ThrownPotion ~ ~ ~ {Potion:{id:"minecraft:lingering_potion",tag:{Potion:"poison"}}}复制代码
